mapper.insert: insert into out_train_all(ota_id, ota_title, training_name, training_lv, course_name, training_location, training_money, training_date, attendees,course_desc,training_reason,om_id,training_type) values(#{trainAll.otaId},#{trainAll.otaTitle},#{trainAll.trainingName},#{trainAll.trainingLv},#{trainAll.courseName}, #{trainAll.trainingLocation},#{trainAll.trainingMoney},#{trainAll.trainingDate},#{trainAll.attendees}, #{trainAll.courseDesc},#{trainAll.trainingReason},#{trainAll.omId},#{trainAll.trainingType})
mapper.select: select a.*,c.om_name from out_train_all as a left join mode_status as b on a.ota_id=b.mode_id LEFT JOIN organization_management as c on a.om_id=c.om_id where b.status=2
select ota_id,course_name from out_train_all as a left join mode_status as b on a.ota_id=b.mode_id where b.status=2
